FuncDef: This command configures the RX/TX cookie for L2TPv3 spoke SDPs for the mirror destination. The command can configure L2TPv3 a single cookie for the egress spoke SDP or one or two cookies for the remote source ingress spoke SDP.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies a 64-bit colon separated hex value.
Specifies a second 64-bit colon separated hex value.
